def.dt: :a large container in which water is heated to produce steam in an engine see also double boiler
:a room with equipment for heating a building or ship :a room in which a boiler is located
:a room with many telephones that are used by people who call strangers and use dishonest or forceful methods to try to sell them something

:a pair of deep cooking pans that fit together so that the contents of the top pan can be cooked or heated by boiling water in the bottom pan Melt the chocolate in a double boiler. see picture at kitchen
:an animal that is like a small horse with large ears
